attributes.action: Reward the elderly, but venerable Actor, Michael Gough with an honour in the Birthday list!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Michael Gough is a fine actor, appearing in films from the 40's onwards.
His Roles have included Alfred Pennyworth in the Batman Series to The Celestial Toymaker in Doctor Who.
As he approaches the end of his life it would be fitting for him to be recognised for his work.
An OBE or MBE would be appropriate.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
